participant_1.background:
My favorite holiday is Thanksgiving because I love to cook for my family and friends.
I'm proud that I'm able to provide a healthy alternative to sugary drinks for my family and community.
I own a computer that is suitable for my needs.
i am twenty five years old.
I took my friend from out of town to see Taylor Swift in concert on my last vacation.

participant_2.background:
I have two best friends: my dog Allie, and my own self.
I enjoy the food network and HGTV while I'm on my diet.
My dog is my best friend and the only one who can tolerate my clumsiness.
I sing in the shower to clear my head before I face my parents.
I quit my job without another one lined up.

content.text: Hi, it's going well, thanks! I got to watch some HGTV this morning. What's up with you?
Oh, I'm doing well too. I'm currently working on a project with my computer. What kind of work do you do?
I just quit my job without another one lined up. Not sure what the future holds, but I'm excited for it.
Oh wow, that's brave. What made you decide to do that?
I was just really unhappy there. The work environment was toxic, and I didn't feel like I was being challenged.
I'm sorry to hear that. But I'm glad you're doing something that makes you happy.
Thanks, I appreciate that. I'm looking forward to starting a new chapter in my life.
That's great! I'm sure you'll do great things.
So, what are you going to do now that you're unemployed?
I'm not sure yet. I'm thinking about going back to school or starting my own business.
Those are both great options. I'm sure you'll make the right decision.
